availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer. Jackson County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Casteel. Married to Minerva Dunham Casteel in 1842. Father of Eliza J. Casteel and Nancy A. Casteel. Married to Henrietta A. Moberley Casteel in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on February 6, 1856. Father of Robert N. Casteel and Amanda Casteel. Farmer in Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, p. 367.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Marriages, p. 6.
"Obituary," Princeton Telegraph (Princeton, Missouri), June 11, 1902, p. 8.
"Lemuel Casteel (1820-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial 7666946, accessed January 21, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/7666946.
